title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Neighborhood Watch Event
content:
Protect and serve this week by completing three Dispatch Work missions to achieve a special Neighborhood Watch Event Weekly Challenge and get the Summer LSPD Officer Outfit along with a GTA$100,000 bonus.

Helping Vincent clean up the streets in Dispatch Work also pays out 2X GTA$ and RP through September 24 (4X Rewards if youâ€™re a GTA+ Member).
